name: Guardian Impact
description:
After the first generation of Guardians established peace among the realm, widespread dissatisfaction set in the hearts of the rich, who had grown tired of the mundane life and prosperity they had gained. 

As an attempt to appease their lust for entertainment, the New Realms Order was formed, and created a series of exhibitions called the Guardian Games.

This a place for knights to prove their skills as heroes, and win the favour of the crowd.

Do you have what it takes to become a Champion, and prove yourself worthy of the crowds praise?

CONTROLS:
----------------
Movement - W,A,S,D
Attack - Mouse 1
Focus Attack - (Hold) Mouse 1 and Release
Counter / Parry - Mouse 2
Jump - Space (While Moving)
Dodge - Tap Shift
Sprint - (Hold) Shift

Options Menu - Escape

REQUIREMENTS:
----------------------
Windows PC 
Windows 7 and Above OS
Video Graphics Card
Mouse and Keyboard
